document.docAuthor: Saboori, A., Sundic, M., Pesic, V. & Hakimitabar, M.
document.docTitle: Hauptmannia striata Saboori & Sundic & Pesic & Hakimitabar 2011
document.masterDocTitle: A New Species Of Hauptmannia (Acari: Erythraeidae) From Montenegro

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A New Species Of Hauptmannia (Acari: Erythraeidae) From Montenegro

heading.emphasis:
Hauptmannia striata Saboori
, ˘Sundi´c & Pe˘si´c, n. sp. ( Figs. 1 – 4 )

subSubSection.paragraph: Palpal tibial claw bifid, palpal accessory claw entire, cheliceral bases striated and punctate, fn Ti 12-13- 13.

Ventral surface of idiosoma bearing 6 sternalae, 4 setae between coxae I and II, 16 barbed setae between coxae II and III and 19 setae behind coxae III. All ventral setae with fine barbs. Sternalae more or less equal in length. Coxae I–III each with one seta; coxala 1b longer than other coxalae; coxala 2b about as long as coxala 3b ; all coxalae barbed ( Fig. 2 ). NDV = 46 + 39 = 85.

caption.paragraph:
TABLE 1: Metric data of
Hauptmannia striata
n. sp.
larvae (a, holotype; b-d, paratypes).

subSubSection.paragraph: Tarsus with 7 setae including one barbed and four nude normal setae, a solenidion and an eupathidium ( Fig. 3 ). fPp = 0-BB-BBN-BNN2- BNNNN ωζ . Palps and ventral gnathosoma with fine punctation. Cheliceral bases striated and punctate. Supracoxal seta of palp ( eP ) 5 long.

Leg segmentation formula: 7-7-7. Leg setal formula: Leg I: Ta- 1 ω , 1 ε , 2 ζ , 1Cp, 24n; Ti- 2 ’ , 1 κ , 12n; Ge- 1 σ , 1 κ , 11n; TFe- 8n; BFe- 4n; Tr- 2n; Cx- 1n (+ 1 eP ) ( Fig. 4A ). Leg II: Ta- 1 ω , 2 ζ , 1Cp, 21n; Ti- 2 ’ , 13n; Ge- 1 σ , 1 κ , 9n; TFe- 5n; BFe- 4n; Tr- 2n; Cx- 1n ( Fig. 4B ). Leg III: Ta- 1 ζ , 18n; Ti- 1 ’ , 13n; Ge- 1 σ , 9n; TFe-
Name referring to the striations on cheliceral bases.
